entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early this morning. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
